imp.core.expressions

Class FunctionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • imp.core.expressions.FunctionManager

  • public class FunctionManager
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to manage all the functions in the imp language

    1.0

    zastrowm

      • addFunctions

        public int addFunctions(FunctionLibrary library,
               java.lang.String namespace)
                 throws FunctionAlreadyExists
        Add a library to the function manager
        Parameters:
        library - the library to add to the function manager
        namespace - the name space to add the function in, overriding the library's Library attribute if it contains one. Pass null to accept the library's Library attribute
        Returns:
        the number of functions added to the manager
        Throws:
        FunctionAlreadyExists

      • hasSignature

        public boolean hasSignature(FunctionSignature sig)
        Check if the manager has a function with that signature
        Parameters:
        sig - the function signature
        Returns:
        true if the manager has a function with that signature

      • getFunction

        public Function getFunction(FunctionSignature sig)
                     throws FunctionSignatureDoesNotExist,
                            FunctionAmbiguous
        Retrieve the function with the designated or return null if it does not exist
        Parameters:
        sig - the signature of the function
        Returns:
        the function signature if it exists, otherwise null
        Throws:
        FunctionSignatureDoesNotExist
        FunctionAmbiguous
